pr_title: doc: use public inner class for reflection

timeline.message: doc: use public inner class for reflection

timeline.bodyText: We should also make it static. The quickstart is OK btw, I just checked it.
timeline.author: gsmet

replies.bodyText: Oh, is it so? Making it public but not static just worked fine for me...am I missing something?
replies.author: kdnakt

replies.bodyText: It works but it's not optimal.
replies.author: gsmet
